venue.name: Tavern in the Square - Central Square

item.description:
While we normally meet on the 4th Wednesday of every month, this month's meeting will be on the 3rd Wednesday (November 17th), so as not to conflict with Thanksgiving (as I understand many of you will be traveling or visiting family on the eve of the 24th!

Our Agenda:
6:00pm to 6:30pm: Refreshments and networking
6:30pm to 7:00pm: Individual introductions to the group
7:00pm to 7:30pm: Group Discussion

- planning future events/venues
- what is hot, what is not
- job hunting resources, places to look

7:30 - 8:00pm: More networking!

If you are a hiring manager, recruiter, or entrepreneur you are welcome to bring with you handouts about your company and any open positions.
item.how_to_find_us: We meet in the large function room behind the bar

group.name: IT Job Seekers Greater Boston (Java, .NET, SQL, LAMP, etc.)

item.name: IT Job Seekers Greater Boston (Java, .NET, SQL, LAMP, etc.) Monthly Meetup
